title: Riot Games Merch Store Beta Now Live

replies.body: is it just me... I WANT PORO!!!
if only i had have known this was coming before i ordered my Mechs Vs Minions as $50 shipping is A rip off

As for those little figures, I prefer Pop vinyl versions of lol characters, heck ill probably make em myself.

Also they are extremely pricey for something so small $25US. Pops usually go for $16AU here. 

But if i know riot, they will Probably sell their pops for over $20AU

It would've been actually nice to state that the shipping company (Fed Ex) cannot be delivered to PO Boxes as I ordered mine on the 8th of December 2014 and nothing came. Asked Player Support, they say 'Fed Ex cannot deliver to PO Boxes.'
oh if only i hadnt buy that burberry wallet... then i might have enough money to buy this
It is about damn time that Riot had a Merchandise store!!!! Little on the Pricey side though :/ hopefully in full release prices are a reasonable.
OMG THE PROROS THEY AMAZING! GJ RIOT!
Wait, so its an online store or an actual physical shop?
theres a link below the picture leading to the Online store of it all. {{champion:36}}
I... really want a {{champion:82}} figurine... I can't be the only one right?

this is the worst joke you will ever hear but 
if {{champion:7}} is a deceiver as she has a clone and other abilities that suit that given title, what would you call {{champion:35}} ??
FAKER 


i told u it was shit
